text: @GeorgeTakei @Mike_Redhead Why is Covid-19 political at all? A pandemic affects everyone, yet a view point on it puts you on one side or the other. Either it’s 100% you are going to die or kill someone (Democrats) or a hoax (Republicans). Neither view point is right, so why the division?
